Dashboard.title: Dashboard
Dashboard.message: You are logged in! This is a protected page.
Dashboard.sessionManagementDescription: Ready to sign out? Your session will be securely terminated.

error.title: Sign In Error
error.accountAlreadyExistsDescription: An account with this email address already exists using a different sign-in method.
error.accountAlreadyExistsDetails: You previously created an account with email and password. To link your Google account, please sign in with your email first.
error.accessDeniedDescription: You do not have permission to sign in.
error.accessDeniedDetails: This could be due to account restrictions or policy violations.
error.configurationErrorDescription: There is a problem with the server configuration.
error.configurationErrorDetails: Please contact support if this issue persists.
error.authenticationErrorDescription: An unexpected error occurred during sign in.
error.authenticationErrorDetails: Please try again or contact support if the problem continues.
error.oauthCallbackErrorDescription: There was a problem connecting with your OAuth provider.
error.oauthCallbackErrorDetails: This could be due to network issues, provider downtime, or configuration problems. Please try signing in again.
error.signInWithEmailFirst: Sign in with your email and password first
error.linkGoogleAccount: Link your Google account from there

Registration.title: Create Your Account
Registration.subtitle: Join us today and get started
Registration.agreeToTerms: I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
Registration.errorEmailExists: An account with this email already exists
Registration.errorWeakPassword: Password must be at least 8 characters long
Registration.errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

Account.title: Account Settings
Account.subtitle: Manage your account and preferences
Account.deleteAccountWarning: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. Please be certain.
Account.confirmDeletion: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
Account.confirmDeletionText: This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.
Account.accountDeleted: Your account has been successfully deleted
Account.deletionFailed: Failed to delete account. Please try again.
Account.addPasswordDescription: Set a password to enable email/password authentication as a backup for your Google account.
Account.changePasswordDescription: Update your current password for enhanced security.
Account.accountLinkingDescription: Link multiple authentication methods to your account for enhanced security and convenience.
Account.emailVerificationDescription: Email verification adds an extra layer of security to your account and enables important notifications.
Account.addExtraSecurityDescription: Add an extra layer of security with time-based codes
Account.twoFactorSecurityDescription: Two-factor authentication significantly increases your account security by requiring a second verification step during login.
Account.disableTwoFactorConfirm: Are you sure you want to disable two-factor authentication? This will make your account less secure.
Account.dangerZoneWarning: Danger Zone: This will permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
Account.googleSignInDescription: You can sign in with your Google account
Account.googleLinkDescription: Link your Google account for easier sign-in
Account.enterPasswordToLink: Enter your password to link your {provider} account
Account.enterPasswordToUnlink: Enter your password to unlink your {provider} account

TwoFactor.tooManyAttempts: Too many failed attempts. Please sign in again.
TwoFactor.invalidCode: Invalid verification code. Please try again.
TwoFactor.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please sign in again.
TwoFactor.metaDescription: Complete your sign-in with two-factor authentication
TwoFactor.signInFailure: Failed to complete sign-in. Please try again.
TwoFactor.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
TwoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
TwoFactor.backupCodeInstructions: Enter one of your backup codes to complete sign-in
TwoFactor.verificationCodeInstructions: Enter the verification code from your authenticator app
TwoFactor.backupCodeNote: Each backup code can only be used once

password.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
password.requireUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password.requireLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
password.requireNumber: Password must contain at least one number
password.requireSpecial: Password must contain at least one special character

name.minLength: Name must be at least 2 characters long

form.validationError: Please check the form for errors

Errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action
Errors.serverError: An error occurred on the server
Errors.unknown: Something went wrong. Please try again.
Errors.accountExists: An account with this email already exists
Errors.verificationTokenUsed: Verification token has already been used
Errors.accountLinkingInProgress: Account linking request already in progress
Errors.accountLinkingCompleted: Account linking has already been completed
Errors.twoFactorNotEnabled: 2FA is not enabled for this user
Errors.failedToDeleteAccount: Failed to delete account. Please try again.
Errors.failedToUpdateProfile: Failed to update profile. Please try again.
Errors.userAlreadyHasPassword: User already has a password. Use change password instead.
Errors.onlyGoogleUsers: Only Google authenticated users can add passwords
Errors.failedToAddPassword: Failed to add password. Please try again.
Errors.userDoesNotHavePassword: User does not have a password set
Errors.failedToChangePassword: Failed to change password. Please try again.
Errors.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters long
Errors.passwordsDoNotMatch: New password and confirmation don't match
Errors.accountAlreadyExists: An account with this email already exists
Errors.passwordMustBeDifferent: New password must be different from current password
Errors.verificationTokenUsed: Verification token has already been used
Errors.invalidSecret: Invalid encrypted secret format. Please try setting up 2FA again.
Errors.emptySecret: Decrypted secret is empty. Please try setting up 2FA again.
Errors.secretDecryptionFailed: Failed to decrypt 2FA secret. Please try setting up 2FA again.
Errors.invalidSecretFormat: Invalid 2FA secret format. Please set up 2FA again.

Success.passwordAdded: Password added successfully! You can now sign in with email and password.
Success.confirmationEmailSent: Confirmation email sent. Please check your email to complete account linking.

ComponentErrors.failedToSendVerificationEmail: Failed to send verification email. Please try again.
ComponentErrors.failedToInitiateAccountLinking: Failed to initiate account linking. Please try again.
ComponentErrors.failedToSetupTwoFactor: Failed to setup 2FA. Please try again.
ComponentErrors.failedToTestCode: Failed to test code. Please try the verification directly.

TwoFactorSetup.accountProtected: Your account is now protected with two-factor authentication
TwoFactorSetup.saveBackupCodes: Save these backup codes in a safe place. You can use them to access your account if you lose your authenticator device.
TwoFactorSetup.backupCodesWarning: Each code can only be used once
TwoFactorSetup.downloadCodesBeforeCompleting: Please download your backup codes before completing the setup
TwoFactorSetup.iHaveSavedCodes: I have saved my backup codes
TwoFactorSetup.title: Setup Two-Factor Authentication
TwoFactorSetup.subtitle: Add an extra layer of security to your account
TwoFactorSetup.setupError: Failed to setup 2FA. Please try again.
TwoFactorSetup.testError: Failed to test code. Please try the verification directly.
TwoFactorSetup.authenticatorApp: An authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.)
TwoFactorSetup.phoneOrTablet: Your phone or tablet to scan the QR code
TwoFactorSetup.safeStorage: A safe place to store backup codes
TwoFactorSetup.qrCodeSubtitle: Use your authenticator app to scan this QR code
TwoFactorSetup.manualEntry: Can't scan? Enter this code manually:
TwoFactorSetup.verificationLabel: Enter verification code from your app:
TwoFactorSetup.backupCodesDescription: Save these backup codes in a secure location. Each code can only be used once.

ConsoleMessages.userIdNotAvailable: User ID not available for account info loading

EmailVerification.successMessage: Your email address has been verified. You can now access all features of your account.
EmailVerification.defaultFailureMessage: The verification link is invalid or has expired.
EmailVerification.requestNewVerification: Please request a new verification email from your account settings.
EmailVerification.needHelp: Need help? Contact our support team.
EmailVerification.metaDescription: Verify your email address to complete your account setup.

AccountLinking.successMessage: Your accounts have been linked successfully. You can now use both authentication methods to sign in.
AccountLinking.enhancedSecurity: Enhanced Security: You now have multiple sign-in options for better account access.
AccountLinking.defaultFailureMessage: The account linking request is invalid or has expired.
AccountLinking.tryAgainInstructions: Please try initiating the account linking process again from your account settings.
AccountLinking.metaDescription: Confirm linking your authentication accounts for enhanced security.
